document_data.title: Breaking Point
document_data.mainbody:
'''''Breaking Point''''' is an adventure in the [[Living Forgotten Realms]] organized play campaign for [[Dungeons & Dragons]] 4{{th}} edition.

{{Quote|''When shopping for weapons the smith suddenly bursts into tears. Somebody captured his wife's soul and is using it to extort money and weapons from the poor smith. He has nothing more to give, and unless you help him everything is lost. A Living Forgotten Realms adventure set in Impiltur for characters levels 4–7.''}}
